name: React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)

details: Kotlin is an expressive, concise & powerful development language on Android. Learn everything you need to know to start.

name: Frontend Fundamentals

details: Learn Cluster Analysis, Classification and Regression, SVM, SVC, Apache Spark, Network Mining, Text Mining...

details: This class is so big we had to split it into 3 different parts. You'll learn the Swift programming language properly.

details: Always wanted to learn a lower-level language, but found it too intimidating? This class is for you.
